title: Trump's sweeping new tariffs take effect against dozens of countries
description: The president also hits India with a 50% tariff and threatened a 100% levy on foreign-made semiconductors.
content:
Last week, the Trump administration announced a revised list of import taxes on dozens of trading partners and extended a deadline for countries to reach agreements with the US to 7 August.
Countries have been racing to strike deals with Washington t... [1856 chars]

title: Rayner asks China to explain redacted mega-embassy plans
description: The deputy prime minister has requested a response over the blacked-out plans by 20 August.
content:
Rayner asks China to explain redacted embassy plans

title: Trump announces yet more tariffs and praises 'significant step' from Apple
description: The US president - who memorably once referred to Tim Cook as Tim Apple - has previously criticised the tech boss and his company after it attempted to avoid his China tariffs by shifting iPhone production to India.
content:
Donald Trump has announced 100% tariffs on computer chips and semiconductors made outside the US.
The move threatens to increase the cost of electronics made outside the US, which covers everything from TVs and video game consoles to kitchen applianc... [2523 chars]

title: Trump news at a glance: president hails progress on Ukraine war and threatens India with steep tariffs
description: Trump may meet Putin as early as next week to discuss the war in Ukraine, White House officials have said – key US politics stories from 6 August 2025
content:
US president Donald Trump may meet with Russian leader Vladimir Putin as early as next week to discuss the war in Ukraine, White House officials have said.
The development comes as senior administration officials have also warned that serious “impedi... [605 chars]

title: Inner London to lose out in funding rebalance, says IFS report
description: The shake-up will affect the share of central government funding distributed to councils in England.
content:
The new funding system, to be phased in over three years from 2026, will see changes to the formulas used by government to capture levels of demand for council-run services, along with the differing cost of delivering them.
A greater share of funding... [1695 chars]
